task: SCAFFOLD a simple Tasks frontend UI with only one page

plannerResult.raw_task: SCAFFOLD a simple Tasks frontend UI with only one page

subtasks.name: agent-a
subtasks.objective: Set up the single-page app shell: entrypoint, root mount, dependency setup, and route/render entry so the Tasks page is the default and only route.

subtasks.name: agent-b
subtasks.objective: Create the one-page Tasks interface with page-level layout, task form controls (create/view placeholders), and static task sections.

subtasks.name: agent-c
subtasks.objective: Implement reusable UI pieces for the page (task row, task list, section header, action buttons) and compose them into the Tasks page.

subtasks.name: agent-d
subtasks.objective: Add baseline styling and responsive behavior for the Tasks page, including card/list/table-like layout, spacing, typography, and mobile adjustments.
